sourcesContent:
<template>
  <not-found-search v-if="filteredProductsCount <= 0"> </not-found-search>
  <products v-else :mountproduct="filteredProducts"> </products>
</template>

<script>
import Products from "../components/ProductWape.vue";
import { useProductData } from "@/stores/Products";
import NotFoundSearch from "@/components/NotFoundSearch.vue";
import ContactService from "@/services/contact.service";
// import ContactService from "@/assets/img/imgLocal/404.png";

export default {
  components: {
    Products,
    NotFoundSearch,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      products: [],
      activeIndex: -1,
      searchText: useProductData(),
    };
  },
  watch: {
    // SearchText() {
    //   this.activeIndex = -1;
    // },
  },
  computed: {
    productStrings() {
      return this.products.map((product) => {
        const { type, name } = product;
        return [type, name].join("").toLowerCase().trim();
      });
    },
    // Trả về các contact có chứa thông tin cần tìm kiếm.
    filteredProducts() {
      return this.products.filter((contact, index) =>
        this.productStrings[index].includes(this.searchText.SearchText)
      );
    },
    activeContact() {
      if (this.activeIndex < 0) return null;
      return this.products[this.activeIndex];
    },
    filteredProductsCount() {
      return this.filteredProducts.length;
    },
  },
  methods: {
    test() {
      console.log(this.searchText.SearchText);
    },
    async retrieveContacts() {
      try {
        this.products = await ContactService.getAll();
      } catch (error) {
        console.log(error);
      }
    },
    refreshList() {
      this.retrieveContacts();
      this.activeIndex = -1;
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.refreshList();
  },
};
</script>

<style>
.SearchEmpty {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  margin-bottom: 100px;
}

.textSearchEmpty {
  text-align: center;
}
</style>
